description:
A peculiar fish with scales of many colors that glimmer
in the light.His face is red around the eyes and mouth
giving the illusion that is wearing a clown makeup.
name: Jester Fish

description: A very common fish coveted for his taste.
name: Common Cod

description:
A peculiar fish with scales of many colors that glimmer
in the light.His face is red around the eyes and mouth
giving the illusion that is wearing a clown makeup.
name: King Jester Fish

description:
A very wierd shrimp that alternate motionless behaviours
with sudden bursts of speed to avoid predation.
name: Flea Shrimp

description:
A special salmon that evolved to become a reckless
predator after surviving mating.
He has stripes on his back like a tiger.
name: Tiger Salmon

description:
A very common fish with an extremely lazy attitude.
It does not taste very good.
name: Lethargic Flounder

description:
A special salmon that evolved to become a reckless
predator after surviving mating.
He has stripes on his back like a tiger.
name: Big Tiger Salmon

description:
A very wierd shrimp that alternate motionless behaviours
with sudden bursts of speed to avoid predation.
This subspecies grow more active during the day.
name: Sunkissed Flea Shrimp

description:
This fighting fish is often spotted duelling other of
his own kind.He may have mistaken the bait for an enemy.
name: Duellist Betta

description: A very common fish coveted for his taste.
name: Big Common Cod

description:
This fighting fish is often spotted duelling other of
his own kind.This powerful one was attracted by the scent
of another Betta!
name: Hispanic Betta

description:
A particullary powerful Swordfish.The name "Trianda"
means 30 because his rostrum is composed of 30 blades.
name: Trianda Swordfish

description:
A particullary powerful Swordfish.The name "Trianda"
means 30 because his rostrum is composed of 30 blades.
name: Tireless Trianda Swordfish

description:
This fighting fish is often spotted duelling other of
his own kind.This powerful one was attracted by the scent
of another Betta!
name: Nocturnal Hispanic Betta

description:
A very peculiar crab that once found a place to call home
will ALWAYS try to go back there!
name: Habit Crab

description:
A very peculiar crab that once found a place to call home
will ALWAYS try to go back there!
This one REALLY missed home...
name: Homeward Crab

description:
A very common fish with NO SENSE of self preservation.
It's not clear if they want to die or they are just really really stupid.
name: Dumbest Guppy

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.
This book teaches you how to use a strong approach without risking losing the fish.
name: Fishing G.:Strong Tug

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.This book teaches you how
to slow down a fish escape effectively doubling the
amount of time before a fish escape.
name: Fishing G.:Slow Escape

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.This book teaches you how
to trust your luck when fishing.
name: Fishing G.:Lucky Fisher

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.
This book teaches you how to prevent a fish from
fighting back too much!
name: Fishing G.:PowerReeling

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.
This book teaches you how to catch multiples fishes at a time when trying to catch weak fishes.
name: Fishing G.:Double Hook

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.
This book teaches you how to prevent a fish from
fighting back too much when they rush outside your field.
name: Fishing G.:Spider Line

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.
This book teaches you how to use a strong approach to tire the fish you are trying to catch more easily!
name: Fishing G.:Tiring Tug

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.
This book teaches you how to not be wasteful with baits granting you a chance to not consume them.
name: Fishing G.:Bait Expert

description:
A very peculiar crab that once found a place to call home
will ALWAYS try to go back there!
name: Big Habit Crab

description:
A very peculiar crab that once found a place to call home
will ALWAYS try to go back there!
This one REALLY missed home...
name: Big Homeward Crab

description:
A particullary smelly worm that makes the fish easier
to catch.For some reason the smell resembles cheese but the taste is completely different.
name: Cheese Earthworm

description:
A particullary strange grub that makes the fish less
likely to escape.
Increase time before the fish escape by 5 seconds.
name: Gluegoo Grub

description:
A particullary strange leech that release a smell
that makes fishes go stupid in order to get it.
Fishing with this bait makes the fish bite faster.
name: Stupidjuice Leech

description:
A particullary strange ball made by many soporific
algae and crayfish.
Make the fish less likely to fight back when fishing.
name: Soporific Pellet

description:
This strange oyster is filled with magical power
that allow it to teleport!
name: Teleporting Oyster

description:
This mysterious "thing" is better described as a
"Failed Experiment" more than as a fish.No coherent Data can be given.
name: Alchemical ChimeraFish 22

description:
This mysterious "thing" is better described as a
"Failed Experiment" more than as a fish.No coherent Data can be given.
name: Alchemical ChimeraFish 74

description:
This mysterious "thing" is better described as a
"Failed Experiment" more than as a fish.No coherent Data can be given.
name: Alchemical ChimeraFish 11

description:
An alchemical altered moth larva.
Can apparently attract alchemical altered fishes.
name: Chimera Worm

description: A basic Lure used for many fishes.
name: Versatile Lure

description:
Despite the name "Devil Pacu" , this is not a Pacu at all
but is actually some kind of piranha which is very funny cause usually people confuse Pacus for Piranhas!
name: Devil Pacu

description:
Despite the name "Devil Pacu" , this is not a Pacu at all
but is actually some kind of piranha which is very funny cause usually people confuse Pacus for Piranhas!
name: Bloodlust Devil Pacu

description: A common squid that is very poor in taste and texture.
name: Disgusting Squid

description:
A very smart squid known for loving to play games.
He must have confused your fishing for another game.
name: Spiel Squid

description:
A very smart squid known for loving to play games.
He must have confused your fishing for another game.This specific exemplar was HUGE in proportions!
name: Titan Spiel Squid

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.
This book makes you reel in a more efficient way allowing for a faster catch.
name: Fishing G.:Reel Deal

description:
A peculiar book about fishing containing impossible
techniques that should be avoided!Make fishing a very wierd experience.
name: Fishing Guide:Madness

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.
This book teaches you how to tire down a fish even when you are not using a strong tug.
name: Fishing G.:Control Tug

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.
This book teaches you how to snag some small treasures when you go fishing.
name: Fishing G.:Money Snagger

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.
This book allow you to percieve time more slowly when you are fishing.You can read it again to turn the effect OFF.
name: Fishing G.:Slow Approach

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.
This book allow you to percieve time at a faster pace when you are fishing.You can read it again to turn the effect OFF.
name: Fishing G.:Fast Approach

description: An amazing fish that can hypnotize predators to escape.
name: Hypnotic BubbleEyes

description:
An amazing fish that can hypnotize predators to escape.
This one is very plump and fat.
name: Big Hypnotic BubbleEyes

description:
A very smart Octopus known for hypnotizing other fishes.
In the wild they usually trick other fishes into bringing him food.
name: Royal Hypnopus

description:
A capricious pink fish that start to panic the exact
moment she percieve danger.
name: Little Duchess Fish

description:
A very capricious fish that start to panic the exact
moment she percieve danger.This is a special specimen that is blue instead of pink.
name: "Baby Blue"

description:
This purple slug is very rare and expensive.
It's the favourite bait of the elusive "Little Duchess Fish".
name: Royal Slug

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.This book makes you reel in a more efficient way allowing you to reel in the fish
even if his position is less than ideal.
name: Fish.G.:Expanded Reeling

description:
Peculiar bait prepared with very small shrimps.
It's the favourite bait of fighting fishes.
name: Brine Shrimp

description:
Peculiar bait prepared with thin pieces of cephalopod flesh.
Squids really like this bait and can appear more easily if used.
name: Squid Stripes

description:
A special kit that allow to transform some fishes into
useful items.
name: Fish Desynthesis Tools

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.This book allow you to vaguely recognize a fish shadow in order to predict
what you are trying to catch.
name: Fish Identification Guide

description:
Sturgeons are very "solid" fishes that have very
strong plates called scutes.This one was particullary stubborn and could not accept defeat in his heart.
name: Stubborn Sturgeon

description:
Sturgeons are very "solid" fishes that have very
strong plates called scutes.This one was particullary stubborn and could not accept defeat in his heart.
name: Big Stubborn Sturgeon

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.
This book teaches you how to start with the fish closer to the surface when you hook it.
name: Fishing G.:Great Start

description:
A very dangerous fish that can explode like a
bomb when threatened.
name: Pilipao Bombfish

description:
A peculiar fish that start to panic the exact
moment they percieve danger.In some places they believe they have healing properties.His real name is Tilapia.
name: Wary Tilepia

description:
This species of flounders with eyes on the left side are
notorious for being extremely slippery and hard to catch.
name: Slipper Lefty

description:
A very dangerous fish that can explode like a
bomb when threatened.This kind of Bombfish is known for tracking movements and following them.
name: Zhadan Bombfish

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.This book explain the
appropriate timing and position for reeling in a fish successfully.
name: Fish.Guide.:Newbie Eyes

description:
A particullary smelly worm that makes the fish easier
to catch.For some reason the smell resembles cheese but the taste is completely different.
name: Improved Cheese Earthworm

description:
A particullary strange grub that makes the fish less
likely to escape.
Increase time before the fish escape by 10 seconds.
name: Improved Gluegoo Grub

description:
A particullary strange ball made by many soporific
algae and crayfish.
Make the fish less likely to fight back when fishing.
name: Improved Soporific Pellet

description:
A very specific kind of worm that love to eat gunpowder.
Despite the strange diet they are not explosive but only slightly flammable.
name: Gunpowder worm

description:
Sturgeons are very "solid" fishes that have very
strong plates called scutes.This one love to fight against storms and strong tides.
name: Kalibano Sturgeon

description:
Sturgeons are very "solid" fishes that have very
strong plates called scutes.This one love to fight against storms and strong tides.Sometimes it seems like electricity is inside this fish.
name: Big Kalibano Sturgeon

description:
A crab that adapted to very hot enviroments.Despite the
name , it cannot swim in magma.
name: Magma Crab

description:
A crab that adapted to very hot enviroments.Despite the
name , it cannot swim in magma but this specimen can survive very hot temperature without a single care in the world.
name: Big Magma Crab

description:
A very slippery eel that secrete a poisonous mucus.
They themselves are immune to it thankfully.
name: Slippery Green Eel

description:
A very slippery eel that secrete a magical mucus
that can easily freeze the water.Sometimes they can be found gliding on the surface of icy lakes.
name: Snowflake Iceglider Eel

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.
This book teaches you how to use a strong approach to tire down even fishes that normally cannot be tired!
name: Fishing G.:Exhaustion Reel

description:
Peculiar bait made with larvaes of hoverflies.It's the
favourite bait for many fishes.
name: Blue Rat-Tailed Maggot

description:
Peculiar bait made with salmon stripes.Some crabs
seems to really enjoy his taste.Some people find this a waste of Salmon.
name: Salmon Stripes bait

description:
Use a recently caught fish to simulate a wounded fish
in order to attract a bigger prey.
name: Mooch

description:
The elusive Stancyk can be considered a king among kings
when it comes to jester fishes.
name: Stancyk Jester Fish

description:
This mysterious "thing" is better described as a
"Failed Experiment" more than as a fish.No coherent Data can be given.
name: Paracelsus ChimeraFish

description:
A bizarre fish with space altering abilities.
It seems that the normal ruling of fishing do not apply to this fish at all.
name: Paradox Guppy

description:
A bizarre fish with both space altering abilities
and hypnotic powers.It seems that the normal ruling of fishing do not apply to this fish at all.
name: Paradox BubbleEyes

description:
An EXTREMELY dangerous fish that can explode like a
bomb when threatened.This kind of Bombfish is known for tracking movements and following them.
name: King Binpo Fish

description:
A very strong crab that love to steal shiny stuff.
It seems to be particularly fond of keys , probably for their shape.
name: Jama Key Crab

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.
This book teaches you how to mitigate the impact that fish resistance have on reeling success.
name: Fishing G.:Stoic Reeling

description:
Homemade Root Beer made by the fisherman.Despite being
useless in combat , it seems to be a great beverage to consume cold before fishing.
name: Fisherman Root Beer

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.This book is probably
the worst fishing guide ever.It only teaches you how to fish for a longer time while drunk without passing out.
name: Fishing G.:Drunk Fishing

description:
Sturgeons are very "solid" fishes that have very
strong plates called scutes.This kind of sturgeon is white as snow and must be tired alot before going down.
name: Albedo Sturgeon

description:
Sturgeons are very "solid" fishes that have very
strong plates called scutes.This kind of sturgeon is white as snow and must be tired alot before going down.
name: Big Albedo Sturgeon

description:
A small white guppy that put up a good fight untill it
gets too tired.
name: "Albedito" Guppy

description:
A curious sea cucumber with an hard shell that resembles
an hard-boiled chicken egg.
name: Sea Egg

description:
An ancient creature that was believed to be extinct.
She can survive for years and years without eating but can't resist the taste of eggs.
name: Tamagocanth

description:
A curious sea cucumber with an hard shell that resembles
an hard-boiled chicken egg.This subspecies is more active and can extend spikes and explode when threatened.
name: Devil Sea Egg

description:
This mysterious "thing" is everchanging as the waves
of the sea.Never the same fish twice.
And it wouldn't want it any other way.
name: Changeling Fish

description:
This special fish is able to fly very fast after
reaching a specific spot from which to take off optimally.
name: Flying Lilian Sardine

description:
This special fish is able to fly very fast.
In some places is considered bad luck to fish them cause their cry sound just like a baby one.
name: Celica Sardine

description:
Peculiar bait that is used while the dragonflies are
still alive and noisy.Favourite bait of flying fishes.
name: Sea Dragonfly

description:
Special Quintessence extracted from fishes and water.
Used by master fishers to upgrade a fishing rod by using 10 of them.
name: R.O.D. Quintessence

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.This book teaches you how
to trust your R.O.D. when fishing;Increase how relevant the R.O.D. Level is when reeling.
name: Fishing G.:Rod Trust

description:
This magical shark have learned how to feed on gold.
And you may ask yourself "Where does it get the gold from?" and the answer is YOU my friend!
name: Mugging Shark

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.This book teaches you to
never give up and may prevent the fish from escaping when reeling isn't going so well!
name: Fishing G.:Last Chance

description:
This magical shark have learned how to feed on gold.
And you may ask yourself "Where does it get the gold from?" and the answer is FISH BANKS my friend!
name: Heister Shark

description:
This magical worm is made of pure gold but turn to
stone when dead.When alive is a perfect bait for some particullary greedy sharks.
name: Aureo Worm

description:
A peculiar book about fishing.You can use it to improve
the power of your tugs by a custom amount.The maximum value scale with R.O.D. level.
name: Fishing G.:Custom Tugs

description:
A particullary strong grub that actually squirm in
reaction to tugging and fight the fish.
Increase Tug Power by 3.
name: Power Grub

description:
A particullary strong grub that actually squirm in
reaction to tugging and fight the fish.
Increase Tug Power by 6.
name: Brute Power Grub

description:
This fighting fish is often spotted making wierd Z
movements.Their combats and mating rituals are very long and confusing.
name: Zorro Betta

description:
A bizzarre small fish with marks that resemble the
number 8 on his back.Said to bring fortune to those whose birthday is the 8th day of any month.
name: N'8 Guppy

description:
A particullary powerful Swordfish that loves to chase
smaller fishes.It seems to love to circle around them.
name: Nascar Swordfish

description:
Learn a trick and assign it to the Q or W key.
This book allow you to Feint the fish,allowing him to escape a little but increasing the time before it leaves.
name: F.Trick Guide:Fish Feint

description:
Learn a trick and assign it to the Q or W key.
This book allow you to trick the fish,allowing him to escape a little but making him grow tired.
name: F.Trick Guide:Disrupt Flow

description:
Learn a trick and assign it to the Q or W key.
This book teaches you how to stun the fish in place for a few seconds in exchange of making it leave earlier.
name: F.Trick Guide:Stun Fish

description:
Learn a trick and assign it to the Q or W key.
This book teaches you how to do a super reel that makes the fish leave earlier but may help you capture the fish faster!
name: F.Trick Guide:Super Reel

description:
A fragile relic that allow one to record memories.
The usefulness of such device is relative to the user ability to "remenber".
name: Stone of Memory

description:
A fragile relic that allow one to record memories.
The usefulness of such device is relative to the user ability to "remenber".
name: Cracked Stone of Memory

description:
Reading this will teach you "True Pirate".
If you already know it,you will learn a random ability.
name: Abi.Tome:True Pirate

description:
This single use scroll remove alot of buffs but also
debuffs from a single enemy.
name: Scroll of Balance

description:
This single use scroll remove alot of buffs but also
debuffs from a single enemy.
name: Scroll of Self Balance

description:
This scroll remove alot of buffs but also debuffs
from a single enemy.
name: Eternal Scroll of Balance

description:
This scroll remove alot of buffs but also debuffs
from you.
name: EternalScroll of S.Balance

description:
This single use scroll cast a spell that protect from
Water damage.
name: Scroll Of Protection:Water

description:
This single use scroll cast a spell that protect from
Thunder damage.
name: ScrollOfProtection:Thunder

description:
This single use scroll cast a spell that protect from
Fire damage.
name: Scroll Of Protection:Fire

description:
This single use scroll cast a spell that protect from
Cold damage.
name: Scroll Of Protection:Cold

description:
This single use scroll cast a spell that increase damage
from Water recieved by an enemy.
name: Scroll Of Curse:Water

description:
This single use scroll cast a spell that increase damage
from Thunder recieved by an enemy.
name: Scroll Of Curse:Thunder

description:
This single use scroll cast a spell that increase damage
from Fire recieved by an enemy.
name: Scroll Of Curse:Fire

description:
This single use scroll cast a spell that increase damage
from Cold recieved by an enemy.
name: Scroll Of Curse:Cold

description:
This single use magical coin will give you a buff that
increase your Attack Stat for 3 rounds.
name: Magical Coin of Strength

description:
This single use magical coin will give you a buff that
increase your Magical Attack Stat for 3 rounds.
name: Magical Coin of Mind Power

description:
This single use magical coin will give you a buff that
increase both your Defences Stat for 3 rounds.
name: Magical Coin of Defence

description:
This single use magical coin will give you a buff that
increase your Max HP for 3 rounds.
name: Magical Coin of Life

description:
This single use magical coin will give you a buff that
increase your Max MP Stat for 3 rounds.
name: Magical Coin of Mana

description:
This single use magical coin will give you a buff that
increase your Speed Stat for 3 rounds.
name: Magical Coin of Agility

description:
This single use magical coin will give you a buff that
increase your Luck Stat for 3 rounds.
name: Magical Lucky Coin

description:
This single use magical coin will give you a buff that
increase your Luck Stat for 7 rounds.
Unlike other magical coins,this one last forever.
name: Gambler Lucky Coin

description:
A very ancient book that is said to have been written
by an High Priest of Ra.When the sun is high in the
sky it brings great luck.
name: Book of Ra

description:
A Yapper Radio that can be used to communicate with
npcs from afar!
name: Yapper Radio

description:
Not Sellable but still very valuable.
You get one by going for an extra lap!
Last Lap Score:\V[558]
name: Lap Coin

description: This tablet make you relive past events.
name: Cursed Tablet of Dejavu

description:
A cool magazine about racing beetles.
Buying this allow you to use the "funky radio" to
bet on racing beetles from everywhere.
name: BeetleBetting Magazine I

description:
A cool magazine about racing beetles.
Buying this allow you to bet more safely resulting in a
refund of your money if you get 2nd or 3rd place.
name: BeetleBetting Magazine II

description:
A cool magazine about racing beetles.
Buying this allow you to gain 50% more money when you
bet correctly at the races.
name: BeetleBetting Magazine III

description: Grant the use of a new ability selected from 2 choices.
name: Ability Choice Tome

description:
A quirky card that deal magical damage based on suit
and number.
Potency:\V[604] Damage:\#\c[18]Fire
name: \#\c[18]\V[604]\N[20]
note: a.isStateAffected(165) ? ( a.luk * v[604] - b.mdf * 1) : ( a.luk * v[604] - b.mdf * 2)

description:
A quirky card that deal magical damage based on suit
and number.
Potency:\V[605] Damage:\#\c[7]Sneak
name: \#\c[7]\V[605]\N[21]

description:
A quirky card that deal magical damage based on suit
and number.
Potency:\V[606] Damage:\#\c[9]Water
name: \#\c[9]\V[606]\N[22]

description:
A quirky card that deal magical damage based on suit
and number.
Potency:\V[607] Damage:\#\c[14]Thunder
name: \#\c[14]\V[607]\N[23]

description:
Type a number and learn what skill correspond to that
in the system.
name: Ability List

description: This coffer contain a random Gem.
name: Weapon Coffer

description:
A strange book that improve your ability to find
Treasures by helping you with the coordinates when you
dig with a shovel.
name: RustBeard Piracy Guide I

description:
A strange book that improve your ability to find
Treasures by allowing you to find multiple treasures on
the same floor.
name: RustBeard Piracy Guide II

description:
A strange book that can make you richer by allowing you
to find some extra gold when you find a treasure chest
while digging.
name: RustBeard Piracy Guide III

description:
Not Sellable but still very valuable.
You get one by climbing the tower while not using
Stat tomes that are not Luck/Life/Mana tomes.
name: Purity Coin

description:
The text on this Tablet change over time reflecting
what a strange entity called "The Chat" think of you.
"StreamerPower:\V[620]"
name: Streamer Tablet

description:
This book just contain a recording of how many times
a beetle has won the races.
name: BeetleBetting Records
